outboundReferences.contextLine: They are one of the possible ways to use [[azure-blob-storage]].

inboundReferences.contextLine: The storage service offers three types of blobs: [[azure-blob-storage-block-blobs]], [[azure-blob-storage-append-blobs]], and [[azure-blob-storage-page-blobs]]. You specify the blob type when you create the blob. Once the blob has been created, its type cannot be changed.
